CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial;Violation of Article 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Protection of property
JUDGES: Anatoly Kovler;Elisabeth Steiner;George Nicolaou;Giorgio Malinverni;Khanlar Hajiyev;Sverre Erik Jebens
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE , a town in LOC .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG of GPE relied on GPE and ordered a pension authority to recalculate the applicant ’s pension and to pay arrears . This judgment became binding on DATE , but was not enforced .

CARDINAL . On DATE a bailiff attached the authority ’s accounts . The authority applied for a judicial review of the attachment order . On DATE the bailiff stayed the enforcement proceedings for DATE pending the judicial review . Later , the bailiff stayed the proceedings CARDINAL more times : on CARDINAL , DATE , and DATE , and DATE . On DATE ORG approved the attachment order , but since the authority had appealed against this decision , the enforcement was stayed pending the appeal , i.e. until DATE .

CARDINAL . The applicant was absent from the hearing of DATE . According to the court , the applicant had asked for the hearing to be held in his absence . According to the applicant , he had never been invited .
CARDINAL . In separate proceedings , on DATE the ORG gave its own interpretation of the Law on State Pensions .

CARDINAL . NORP The pension authority considered that this interpretation superseded the interpretation given by ORG , and on this ground asked it to reconsider the case due to newly - discovered circumstances . On DATE ORG granted this request , rejected the applicant ’s claim against the pension authority , and terminated the enforcement proceedings .
CARDINAL . Under LAW of DATE , a bailiff must enforce a judgment within DATE .

CARDINAL . Under section CARDINAL of this PERSON , if there are interfering circumstances , a bailiff may on his own initiative or on the initiative of the debtor stay enforcement proceedings for a period of DATE . In this case he shall issue a decision in this regard and notify it to the parties , to the court , or any other body that has issued the writ of enforcement . This bailiff ’s decision may be appealed against in a relevant court within DATE .
